trans-unit.source: Describes the version of a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Descrive la versione di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> values are used when retrieving the value found in a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> using <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> or the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> valori vengono utilizzati durante il recupero del valore trovato un <xref:System.Data.DataRow> utilizzando <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> o <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> del <xref:System.Data.DataRow> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> informs you what version of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> exists.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> indica la versione di un <xref:System.Data.DataRow> esiste.

trans-unit.source: Versions change under the following circumstances:
trans-unit.target: Nelle versioni modificare nelle circostanze seguenti:

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> method, if you change the value, the `Current` and `Proposed` values become available.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata di <xref:System.Data.DataRow> dell'oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> metodo, se si modifica il valore, il `Current` e `Proposed` valori diventano disponibili.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata di <xref:System.Data.DataRow> dell'oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A> (metodo), il `Proposed` valore viene eliminato.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.EndEdit%2A> method, the Proposed value becomes the `Current` value.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata di <xref:System.Data.DataRow> dell'oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.EndEdit%2A> (metodo), il valore proposto diventa il `Current` valore.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata di <xref:System.Data.DataRow> dell'oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> (metodo), il `Original` sarà identico al valore di `Current` valore.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata di <xref:System.Data.DataTable> dell'oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> (metodo), il `Original` sarà identico al valore di `Current` valore.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RejectChanges%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is discarded, and the version becomes `Current`.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata di <xref:System.Data.DataRow> dell'oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RejectChanges%2A> (metodo), il `Proposed` valore del parametro viene ignorato e la versione diventa `Current`.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks the <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> before invoking the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene controllato il <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> di un <xref:System.Data.DataRow> prima di richiamare il <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: For a <see langword="DataRowState" /> value of <see langword="Added" />, <see langword="Modified" /> or <see langword="Deleted" />, the default version is <see langword="Current" />.
trans-unit.target: Per un valore <see langword="DataRowState" /> di <see langword="Added" />, <see langword="Modified" /> o <see langword="Deleted" />, la versione predefinita è <see langword="Current" />.

trans-unit.source: For a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowState" /> value of <see langword="Detached" />, the version is <see langword="Proposed" />.
trans-unit.target: Per un valore <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowState" /> di <see langword="Detached" />, la versione predefinita è <see langword="Proposed" />.

trans-unit.source: The row contains its original values.
The row contains a proposed value.
